mapper.select: select m.member_name, d.department_name, p.position_name, m.enrollday, a.annual_create||'일' as annual_create, case when s.sign_status = 'C' then '승인' when s.sign_status = 'O' then '진행' when s.sign_status = 'R' then '반려' when s.sign_status = 'N' then '대기' end sign_status from tb_annual a join tb_member m on (a.member_no = m.member_no) join tb_department d on (m.department = d.department_no) join tb_position p on (m.position = p.position_no) join tb_sign s on (m.member_no = s.member_no) join tb_annual_sign an on (s.sign_no = an.sign_no) where annual_startday = to_Date(#{annualUseDay}) order by member_no
